content.text:
# 2014 President of Ireland's Cup

The '''2014 President's Cup''' was the inaugural President's Cup. The match was played between 2013 League of Ireland Premier Division champions, St Patrick's Athletic, and 2013 FAI Cup Final winners Sligo Rovers at Richmond Park on  2 March 2014. The match finished 1â€“0 to St Patrick's Athletic, with Keith Fahey scoring with a right-footed volley top the top right corner from 25 yards after 18 minutes.
Match

| stadium= Richmond Park
| attendance= 1,330
| referee= Paul McLaughlin
